ygData.subject: Battle of the Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chordate/Caitiff: Dark One barrel

Received: from KSLawdogg@... by imo-r20.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v28.34.) id a.26.e8c59dd (3945) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Thu, 14 Dec 2000 22:32:02 -0500 (EST)
Message-ID: <26.e8c59dd.276aeab2@...>
Date: Thu, 14 Dec 2000 22:32:02 EST
Subject: Battle of the Cybertronian Fire
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Serpentor/Unitron/Chordate/Caitiff:



Dark One barrel rolled, dodging most of the shots, some grazing the 
underbelly of his current form.  He barely dodged an EMP blast, cursing.  
"I'm always the main target!" he yelled, firing down to missiles at Teltoli.  
His bottom was down towards the ground, so he was not effected by the flare.

---

Breakdown transformed into his artillery mode, firing off a shell at the 
Cybertronian Fire.  The flare went off, but since Breakdown didn't have any 
optics in this form, he was unharmed.

---

Pyro transformed to tank mode, firing off three fire balls at Hot Rod, 
driving for him.  "You're going down traitor!"  Being in a tank form, he was 
not effected by the flare.

---

Hiss energized his fusion cannon.  He ducked down, as his optics were blinded 
by the flare.

---

Scavenger laughed as the flare went off.  He remembered the last time Magnus 
had tossed a flare, and had prepared himself.  He fired off 25 explosive 
rounds at Magnus, charging at full speed.

---

Sixshot dived downard, avoiding most of the shots, some clipping his back 
dorsal fin.  He yelled out in an attempt of intimidation, firing off ten 
rapid laser blasts at Aerotaur.  His bottom was pointed to the ground, so the 
flare had no effect.

---

Dark Claw drove up to the scene of the battle, launching off two missiles at 
the Cybertronian Fire, the weapons exploding against the shields.  The flare 
went off, and a cycle later out popped his brethren, Demon Wulf and Flesh 
Ripper.

Demon Wulf touched to the ground, raising his sword to point at Gabriel, and 
firing off a blade missile at him, the blade of his sword being replaced in 
less than a second.

Flesh Ripper fired off ten rapid optic blasts at Rex, walking towards the 
Maximal with his teeth showing and his claws outstretched from his finger 
tips.

---

Double Punch saw autogun fire hit near him, trying to hit a fellow Alliance 
member next to him (Godfather).  He saw Teltoli open fire on Godfather, and 
raised both pinchers, and smiled to himself while in his stealth mode.  "Bye, 
bye..." he cursed and covered his optics as the flare went off, still 
invisible though.

---

Manterror covered his optics, but soon regained his composure, firing down 
two ion disks at Caitiff.

---

Injector dived, but the flare blinded him, sending him slamming into the 
ground, an EMP blast hitting his knee joint and making his leg useless 
temporarily.

---

Bumblebee averted his eyes from the flash, and awaited until it cleared.  He 
fired down a total of six stinger missiles at the Cybertronian Fire, three 
from each weapon.  He watched them explode against the shields, and then 
dodged autogun fire.

---

Ares transformed to tank mode.  But in midtransformation, the flare went off 
and blinded him, so he collapsed, holding his optics, in midtransformation.

---

Serpentor slithered, transforming into biped mode and charging, seeing Magnus 
fire the flare into the air.  He deactivated his optic sensors until the 
flare died out, and reactivated them.  He hoisted his plasma launcher up 
against his shoulder, and fired a blast at the Cybertronian Fire.

---  

Caitiff flew backwards, slamming to the ground from all the shots.  He got 
up, chest bleeding, when one ion disk passed over his head, and the other 
slashed off his left hand.  He fell to his knees, letting out screams of pain.

====

Chordate slammed his fist against an armrest of his chair.  "Slag it!  
Kluster, requesting authorization to use the missile launchers.  We need to 
fire them into the bulk of the Alliance to scatter them."  He watched as the 
shields dropped to 74%.
